review.title: “Great opportunity for recruiting.”
review.pros: Pros – Good atmosphere, good compensation plan, great training, good people.
review.cons: Cons – Still a small company and they lack a strong benefits package.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Good Environment”
review.pros: Pros – The owner genuinely cares about the business and the employees that are working there. I enjoyed my time at Zambito.
review.cons: Cons – Tough Market to work in. You have to be mentally tough and open to market changes and learning how to overcome them.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Add a sophisticated training program and give the opportunity for people to move "up the ladder". The business is tough enough.
